sig_info: Iron Man overloads the Arc Reactor in his chest if Health drops below 15%, briefly extending his life span with a burst of 261.25 to 561.37 Health.
While in Arc Overload, Iron Man also gains an Armor Up for 6 seconds, increasing his Armor Rating by 533.33 to 1857.18.

WHEN ATTACKED: 11% chance to gain an Armor Up Buff for 6 seconds, granting +1955.56 Armor Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 70% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 1600 for 8 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 2120.93 for 9 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 3105.88 for 10 seconds.
